entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023
